metadata.description: He’s always liked tall men， even better if they have big hands and mouths. And clumsy ones are easy to handle... This is a pure love story about a capable and stoic man. This anthology contains six stories， including the title story and other works about an elementary school teacher， police officer， nursery school teacher， and office worker!
metadata.name: The More Useless He Is, The More I Love him (Yaoi Manga)
